trans-unit.source: Provides methods for <see cref="T:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance" /> derived classes to access the functionality of the workflow runtime.
trans-unit.target: Fornisce i metodi che consentono alle classi derivate <see cref="T:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance" /> di accedere alla funzionalit√† del runtime del flusso di lavoro.

trans-unit.source: Aborts the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance" />.
trans-unit.target: Interrompe l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance" />.

trans-unit.source: Once <xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.WorkflowInstanceControl.Abort%2A> is called, most <xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.WorkflowInstanceControl> APIs except <xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.WorkflowInstanceControl.Abort%2A> throw an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>.
trans-unit.target: Dopo la chiamata ad <xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.WorkflowInstanceControl.Abort%2A>, la maggior parte delle API <xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.WorkflowInstanceControl> tranne <xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.WorkflowInstanceControl.Abort%2A> genera un oggetto <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>.

trans-unit.source: Aborts the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance" />.
trans-unit.target: Interrompe l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance" />.

trans-unit.source: Once <xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.WorkflowInstanceControl.Abort%2A> is called, most <xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.WorkflowInstanceControl> APIs except <xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.WorkflowInstanceControl.Abort%2A> throw an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>.
trans-unit.target: Dopo la chiamata ad <xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.WorkflowInstanceControl.Abort%2A>, la maggior parte delle API <xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.WorkflowInstanceControl> tranne <xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.WorkflowInstanceControl.Abort%2A> genera un oggetto <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>.

trans-unit.source: The reason for aborting the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance" />.
trans-unit.target: Motivo dell'interruzione di <see cref="T:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance" />.

trans-unit.source: Aborts the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance" /> using the specified exception.
trans-unit.target: Interrompe <see cref="T:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance" /> tramite l'eccezione specificata.

trans-unit.source: Once <xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.WorkflowInstanceControl.Abort%2A> is called, most <xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.WorkflowInstanceControl> APIs except <xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.WorkflowInstanceControl.Abort%2A> throw an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>.
trans-unit.target: Dopo la chiamata ad <xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.WorkflowInstanceControl.Abort%2A>, la maggior parte delle API <xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.WorkflowInstanceControl> tranne <xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.WorkflowInstanceControl.Abort%2A> genera un oggetto <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>.

trans-unit.source: The time period after which to abort the attempt.
trans-unit.target: Periodo di tempo dopo il quale interrompere il tentativo.

trans-unit.source: The method to be called when the track operation has completed.
trans-unit.target: Metodo da chiamare al termine dell'operazione di rilevamento.

trans-unit.source: The information about the asynchronous operation.
trans-unit.target: Informazioni sull'operazione asincrona.

trans-unit.source: Called by the workflow runtime to begin sending pending tracking records to tracking participants asynchronously.
trans-unit.target: Chiamato dal runtime del flusso di lavoro per iniziare l'invio in modo asincrono di record di rilevamento in sospeso ai partecipanti del rilevamento.

trans-unit.source: The status of the current track operation.
trans-unit.target: Stato dell'operazione di rilevamento corrente.

trans-unit.source: The status of the asynchronous track operation.
trans-unit.target: Stato dell'operazione di rilevamento asincrona.

trans-unit.source: Called by the workflow runtime to end the track operation.
trans-unit.target: Chiamato dal runtime del flusso di lavoro per terminare l'operazione di rilevamento.

trans-unit.source: The object to compare.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto da confrontare.

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the current <see cref="T:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.WorkflowInstanceControl" /> is equal to the specified object.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce un valore che indica se l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.WorkflowInstanceControl" /> corrente √® uguale all'oggetto specificato.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> of the object is equal to the current <see cref="T:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.WorkflowInstanceControl" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se l'oggetto √® uguale all'oggetto corrente <see cref="T:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.WorkflowInstanceControl" />; in caso contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The time period after which to abort the attempt.
trans-unit.target: Periodo di tempo dopo il quale interrompere il tentativo.

trans-unit.source: Called by the workflow runtime to send pending tracking records to tracking participants.
trans-unit.target: Chiamato dal runtime del flusso di lavoro per inviare record di rilevamento in sospeso ai partecipanti del rilevamento.

trans-unit.source: Returns the exception that causes the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance" /> to abort.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce l'eccezione che causa l'interruzione di <see cref="T:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance" />.

trans-unit.source: The exception that caused the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance" /> to abort, or <see langword="null" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance" /> did not abort.
trans-unit.target: Eccezione che ha causato l'interruzione di <see cref="T:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance" /> oppure <see langword="null" /> se <see cref="T:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance" /> non si √® interrotto.

trans-unit.source: Returns the collection of available bookmarks for the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance" />.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce la raccolta di segnalibri disponibili per <see cref="T:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance" />.

trans-unit.source: Returns the collection of available bookmarks for the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance" />.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce la raccolta di segnalibri disponibili per <see cref="T:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance" />.

trans-unit.source: A collection of bookmarks for the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance" />.
trans-unit.target: Raccolta di segnalibri per <see cref="T:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance" />.

trans-unit.source: The bookmark scope to inspect.
trans-unit.target: Ambito del segnalibro da controllare.

trans-unit.source: Returns the collection of available bookmarks for the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance" /> created in the specified <see cref="T:System.Activities.BookmarkScope" />.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce la raccolta di segnalibri disponibili per l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance" /> creato nell'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Activities.BookmarkScope" /> specificato.

trans-unit.source: The collection of bookmarks created in the specified <see cref="T:System.Activities.BookmarkScope" />.
trans-unit.target: Raccolta di segnalibri creati nell'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Activities.BookmarkScope" /> specificato.

trans-unit.source: Returns the final <see cref="T:System.Activities.ActivityInstanceState" /> of the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance" />.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Activities.ActivityInstanceState" /> finale di <see cref="T:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance" />.

trans-unit.source: Returns the final <see cref="T:System.Activities.ActivityInstanceState" /> of the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance" />.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Activities.ActivityInstanceState" /> finale di <see cref="T:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance" />.

trans-unit.source: One of the enumeration members that describes the state of an activity instance.
trans-unit.target: Uno dei membri dell'enumerazione che descrive lo stato di un'istanza di un'attivit√†.

trans-unit.source: When this method returns, <c>terminationException</c> contains the exception that caused the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance" /> to terminate, or <see langword="null" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance" /> did not terminate.
trans-unit.target: Quando viene restituito questo metodo, <c>terminationException</c> contiene l'eccezione che ha causato la terminazione di <see cref="T:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance" /> oppure <see langword="null" /> se <see cref="T:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance" /> non √® stato terminato.

trans-unit.source: This parameter is passed uninitialized.
trans-unit.target: Questo parametro viene passato non inizializzato.

trans-unit.source: Returns the final <see cref="T:System.Activities.ActivityInstanceState" /> of the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance" />, including termination exception.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Activities.ActivityInstanceState" /> finale di <see cref="T:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance" />, inclusa l'eccezione di terminazione.

trans-unit.source: One of the enumeration members that describes the state of an activity instance.
trans-unit.target: Uno dei membri dell'enumerazione che descrive lo stato di un'istanza di un'attivit√†.

trans-unit.source: When this method returns, <c>outputs</c> contains a dictionary of <see cref="F:System.Activities.ArgumentDirection.Out" /> arguments of the workflow, keyed by argument name.
trans-unit.target: Quando viene restituito questo metodo, <c>outputs</c> contiene un dizionario di argomenti <see cref="F:System.Activities.ArgumentDirection.Out" /> del flusso di lavoro, con chiave basata sul nome dell'argomento.

trans-unit.source: This parameter is passed uninitialized.
trans-unit.target: Questo parametro viene passato non inizializzato.

trans-unit.source: When this method returns, <c>terminationException</c> contains the exception that caused the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance" /> to terminate, or <see langword="null" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance" /> did not terminate.
trans-unit.target: Quando viene restituito questo metodo, <c>terminationException</c> contiene l'eccezione che ha causato la terminazione di <see cref="T:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance" /> oppure <see langword="null" /> se <see cref="T:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance" /> non √® stato terminato.

trans-unit.source: This parameter is passed uninitialized.
trans-unit.target: Questo parametro viene passato non inizializzato.

trans-unit.source: Returns the final <see cref="T:System.Activities.ActivityInstanceState" /> of the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance" />, including workflow outputs and termination exception.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Activities.ActivityInstanceState" /> finale di <see cref="T:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance" />, inclusi gli output del flusso di lavoro e l'eccezione di terminazione.

trans-unit.source: One of the enumeration members that describes the state of an activity instance.
trans-unit.target: Uno dei membri dell'enumerazione che descrive lo stato di un'istanza di un'attivit√†.

trans-unit.source: Returns the hash code for this <see cref="T:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.WorkflowInstanceControl" />.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce il codice hash per questo oggetto <see cref="T:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.WorkflowInstanceControl" />.

trans-unit.source: The hash code for this <see cref="T:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.WorkflowInstanceControl" />.
trans-unit.target: Codice hash per <see cref="T:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.WorkflowInstanceControl" />.

trans-unit.source: Returns a dictionary of variables in the current scope that have been specified with <see cref="F:System.Activities.VariableModifiers.Mapped" />.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce un dizionario di variabili nell'ambito corrente specificato con <see cref="F:System.Activities.VariableModifiers.Mapped" />.

trans-unit.source: A dictionary of mapped variables currently in scope.
trans-unit.target: Dizionario di variabili di cui √® stato eseguito il mapping attualmente presenti nell'ambito.

trans-unit.source: Called by the workflow runtime to determine whether this workflow instance has pending tracking records and a tracking participant.
trans-unit.target: Chiamato dal runtime del flusso di lavoro per determinare se questa istanza del flusso di lavoro dispone di record di rilevamento in sospeso e di un partecipante del rilevamento.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if this workflow instance has pending tracking records and a tracking participant; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se questa istanza del flusso di lavoro dispone di record di rilevamento in sospeso e di un partecipante del rilevamento; in caso contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance" /> is in a state where it can be persisted.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che indica se <see cref="T:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance" /> √® in uno stato in cui pu√≤ essere reso persistente.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance" /> can be persisted; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se <see cref="T:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance" /> pu√≤ essere reso persistente; in caso contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The first <see cref="T:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.WorkflowInstanceControl" /> to compare.
trans-unit.target: Primo oggetto <see cref="T:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.WorkflowInstanceControl" /> da confrontare.

trans-unit.source: The second <see cref="T:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.WorkflowInstanceControl" /> to compare.
trans-unit.target: Secondo oggetto <see cref="T:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.WorkflowInstanceControl" /> da confrontare.

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether two <see cref="T:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.WorkflowInstanceControl" /> instances are equal.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce un valore che indica se due istanze di <see cref="T:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.WorkflowInstanceControl" /> sono uguali.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the two <see cref="T:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.WorkflowInstanceControl" /> instances are equal; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se le due istanze di <see cref="T:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.WorkflowInstanceControl" /> sono uguali; in caso contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The first <see cref="T:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.WorkflowInstanceControl" /> to compare.
trans-unit.target: Primo oggetto <see cref="T:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.WorkflowInstanceControl" /> da confrontare.

trans-unit.source: The second <see cref="T:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.WorkflowInstanceControl" /> to compare.
trans-unit.target: Secondo oggetto <see cref="T:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.WorkflowInstanceControl" /> da confrontare.

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether two <see cref="T:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.WorkflowInstanceControl" /> instances are not equal.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce un valore che indica se due istanze di <see cref="T:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.WorkflowInstanceControl" /> non sono uguali.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the two <see cref="T:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.WorkflowInstanceControl" /> instances are not equal; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se le due istanze <see cref="T:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance.WorkflowInstanceControl" /> non sono uguali; in caso contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Requests that the workflow runtime pause the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance" /> at the next point of execution where it is possible to persist.
trans-unit.target: Richiede che il runtime del flusso di lavoro sospenda <see cref="T:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance" /> in corrispondenza del successivo punto di esecuzione in cui √® possibile impostare la persistenza.

trans-unit.source: Note that the scheduler queue may not be empty at this point.
trans-unit.target: Si noti che la coda dell'utilit√† di pianificazione potrebbe non essere vuota in corrispondenza di questo punto.

trans-unit.source: Prepares the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance" /> state for serialization.
trans-unit.target: Prepara lo stato di <see cref="T:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance" /> per la serializzazione.

trans-unit.source: A workflow instance state.
trans-unit.target: Stato dell'istanza del flusso di lavoro.

trans-unit.source: Requests that the scheduler stops.
trans-unit.target: Richiede l'arresto dell'utilit√† di pianificazione.

trans-unit.source: Instructs the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance" /> to begin execution.
trans-unit.target: Indica a <see cref="T:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance" /> di iniziare l'esecuzione.

trans-unit.source: Schedules a <see cref="T:System.Activities.Bookmark" /> resumption.
trans-unit.target: Pianifica una ripresa di <see cref="T:System.Activities.Bookmark" />.

trans-unit.source: The bookmark to resume.
trans-unit.target: Segnalibro da riprendere.

trans-unit.source: The data to be passed to the activity that created the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Bookmark" />.
trans-unit.target: Dati da passare all'attivit√† che ha creato l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Activities.Bookmark" />.

trans-unit.source: Schedules a bookmark resumption with the specified value.
trans-unit.target: Pianifica una ripresa del segnalibro con il valore specificato.

trans-unit.source: One of the enumeration values that indicates the result of a <see cref="T:System.Activities.Bookmark" /> scheduling operation.
trans-unit.target: Uno dei valori di enumerazione indicante il risultato di un'operazione di pianificazione di <see cref="T:System.Activities.Bookmark" />.

trans-unit.source: The bookmark to resume.
trans-unit.target: Segnalibro da riprendere.

trans-unit.source: The data to be passed to the activity that created the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Bookmark" />.
trans-unit.target: Dati da passare all'attivit√† che ha creato l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Activities.Bookmark" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Activities.Bookmark" /> under which the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Bookmark" /> was created.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Activities.Bookmark" /> con il quale √® stato creato <see cref="T:System.Activities.Bookmark" />.

trans-unit.source: Schedules a <see cref="T:System.Activities.Bookmark" /> resumption from the specified <see cref="T:System.Activities.BookmarkScope" />.
trans-unit.target: Pianifica una ripresa di <see cref="T:System.Activities.Bookmark" /> dall'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Activities.BookmarkScope" /> specificato.

trans-unit.source: One of the enumeration values that indicates the result of a <see cref="T:System.Activities.Bookmark" /> scheduling operation.
trans-unit.target: Uno dei valori di enumerazione indicante il risultato di un'operazione di pianificazione di <see cref="T:System.Activities.Bookmark" />.

trans-unit.source: Schedules the cancellation of the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance" />.
trans-unit.target: Pianifica l'annullamento di <see cref="T:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance" />.

trans-unit.source: This method schedules a cancel request for the root activity of the <xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance>.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo pianifica una richiesta di annullamento per l'attivit√† radice di <xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the state of the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance" />.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene lo stato della classe <see cref="T:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance" />.

trans-unit.source: One of the enumeration values that specifies the state of a <see cref="T:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance" />.
trans-unit.target: Uno dei valori di enumerazione che specifica lo stato di un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance" />.

trans-unit.source: The exception that is the reason for terminating the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance" />.
trans-unit.target: Eccezione che costituisce il motivo per terminare <see cref="T:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance" />.

trans-unit.source: Transitions the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance" /> into the terminal <see cref="F:System.Activities.ActivityInstanceState.Faulted" /> state using the specified exception.
trans-unit.target: Esegue la transizione di <see cref="T:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstance" /> allo stato <see cref="F:System.Activities.ActivityInstanceState.Faulted" /> finale tramite l'eccezione specificata.

trans-unit.source: The tracking record to add.
trans-unit.target: Record di rilevamento da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Called by the workflow runtime to add the specified pending record to the list of pending records.
trans-unit.target: Chiamato dal runtime del flusso di lavoro per aggiungere il record in sospeso specificato all'elenco di record in sospeso.

trans-unit.source: Called by the workflow runtime to determine whether tracking is enabled in this workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: Chiamato dal runtime del flusso di lavoro per determinare se il rilevamento √® abilitato in questa istanza del flusso di lavoro.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if tracking is enabled in this workflow instance; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se il rilevamento √® abilitato in questa istanza del flusso di lavoro; in caso contrario, <see langword="false" />.
